00070         _stack.clear();

00073     NDC::ContextStack* NDC::_cloneStack() {
00074         return new ContextStack(_stack);
00075     }

00077     const std::string& NDC::_get() const {
00078         static std::string empty = "";
00079 
00080         return _stack.empty() ?
00081             empty :
00082             _stack.back().fullMessage;
00083     }
00084 
00085     int NDC::_getDepth() const {
00086         return _stack.size();
00087     }
00088 
00089     void NDC::_inherit(NDC::ContextStack* stack) {
00090         _stack = *stack;
00091     }
00092 
00093     std::string NDC::_pop() {
00094         std::string result = _stack.back().message;
00095         _stack.pop_back();
00096         return result;
00097     }
00098 
00099     void NDC::_push(const std::string& message) {
00100         if (_stack.empty()) {
00101             _stack.push_back(DiagnosticContext(message));
00102         } else {            
00103             _stack.push_back(DiagnosticContext(message, _stack.back()));
00104         }
00105     }
